name: gallery-itsalogin
description: supplies Y.getLogin() through the Y.ITSAMessageController. You get a promise that holds a username and password, which are retrieved through a synclayer.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: standard
examples.description: This example shows how to create a standard Y.getLogin() promise
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: nonrejectable
examples.description: This example shows how to create a Y.getLogin() promise that can be closed (thus rejected).
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: retrieve
examples.description: This example shows how setup the Y.getLogin()-promise with retrieval of the username or password.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: usernameisemail
examples.description: This example shows how setup the Y.getLogin()-promise with an emailaddress as username.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: resetpassword
examples.description: This example shows how setup the Y.getLogin()-promise to force a passwordreset once loggedin.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: newaccount
examples.description: This example shows how setup the Y.getLogin()-promise with the posibility of creating a new account.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: newaccountbutton
examples.displayName: just a button for new account
examples.description: This example shows how to create a new account without Y.ITSALogin, but just a button.
author: itsasbreuk

examples.name: customize
examples.description: This example shows how to customize internationalized messages.
author: itsasbreuk
